channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Test Cricket
channel.desc: Day one highlights from the fourth Test match between England and India.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
channel.desc: In Scotland, Monica Galetti and Rob Rinder discover Glenapp Castle, where guests are treated to a magical stay made possible by a dedicated team of local staff. Monica and Rob are put to work collecting home-grown veg for the kitchens.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mix Tape
channel.desc: In 1989, Daniel is left reeling and heartbroken at Alison's sudden disappearance. In 2015, a surprise betrayal takes Daniel by surprise.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
channel.desc: Paul, Bob and Ted travel a short distance to Thornwood Springs Fishery in Essex, a complex of three lakes on the edges of Epping Forest, in search of a big rudd - although there's also the chance of a trout in the waters.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.
